Productos populares.

Resultado coincidente
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductEntity } from 'src/app/interface/productEntity'; import { productServicio } from 'src/app/servicios/product.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent implements OnInit{ searchRunning: boolean = false; products: ProductEntity[] = []; @Input() SearchResults :ProductEntity[] =[] constructor( private _productService: productServicio ){} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadMostSelling(); } metodo(){ if(this.SearchResults.length == 0){ } } loadMostSelling(){ this._productService.mostSellingList() .subscribe((seleccion: ProductEntity[]) => { this.products = seleccion; }) .add() } }
